archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Party Orders
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Processes ensure party orders are being processed and delivered efficiently and effectively.

properties.value: Manage Party Orders processes manages orders to ensure they are being processed and delivered efficiently and effectively. These processes also manage notifications or requests from parties regarding forced or requested changes to the order or delivery schedule. These change requests may be caused by the party or may be outside their control. Change requests are provided to the originating process(es) where a resolution is agreed.
